extends Object
    An implementation of variational inference LDA which can be saved and loaded
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • computeLikelihood

        public double computeLikelihood(Document doc,
                       LDAVariationlState vstate)
        Calculates a lower bound for the log liklihood of a document given current parameters. When this is maximised it minimises the KL divergence between the the variation posterior and the true posterior. The derivation can be seen in the appendix of Blei's LDA paper 2003
        Parameters:
        doc -
        vstate -
        Returns:
        the likelihood
